text: E jenumanja achinaŵandu! Mun’jogopani M’mbuje gwenu (Allah), ni llijogope soni Lisiku lyangakomboleka nangolo kunkamuchisya mwanagwe, namuno mwanache kwakamuchisya ŵanangolo ŵakwe chilichose. Chisimu chilanga cha Allah chakuonaonape. Basi ukannyenga ŵanganyammwe ata panandi umi wa duniya, nambo soni akannyenga jenumanja ata panandi nkunyenga (shetani) pa ya Allah
